content: free version of this pattern available at https //www sweetsofties com/2024/06/taki-toucan html yarn kit available at https //yarnsea com/en/project/2658/taki-the-toucan-amigurumi-crochet-pattern taki the toucan is an adorable tropical bird amigurumi pattern that is quick and easy to work up it is a low-sew pattern with the head body tail and legs all crocheted together with no-sew methods the only sewing required is to attach the beak to the head this stuffed animal toy can stand on its own and would make a great keychain last-minute birthday gift or christmas holiday present since it s a fast and easy pattern it s also suitable for stocking up as a product for craft fairs and markets the pdf pattern includes some progress photos to help guide you through the crochet doll making process **size** height 3 5 inches **materials** super bulky weight 6 yarn in grey orange yellow and blue i used hobbii toucan yarn 5mm crochet hook 10mm plastic safety eyes x2 yarn needle stuffing scissors **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below attaching yarn and changing yarn colors **stitches & techniques us terms ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together *copyright notice this pattern is © 2024 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not translate distribute copy alter or sell this pattern in any way my patterns may not be used in video tutorials or for teaching classes both online and in-person you may link to this pattern but you may not copy any part of the pattern instructions on other
